ComicInfo.Title: Clan-Building Chapter one: Nightwatch
ComicInfo.Summary: Part 1 of the 2 issue Re-introduction of the Manhattan Gargoyle Clan, the story retells the last "canon" Gargoyles Episode "The Journey"Free from a medieval Scottish curse, the Gargoyles now live in the rooftops of Manhattan. Recently humanity has learned of their existence, and without their anonymity comes new enemies. A mysterious organization called the Quarrymen are determined to see them all obliterated. The gargoyles must rely on each other and their human friends to turn the tide of public sentiment and show that they can live peacefully with humanity.
